data.text:
Location Advantage Red Rock Casino Resort & Spa's strategic location at the gateway to Red Rock Canyon and only 12 miles from the Las Vegas Strip offers a unique selling point for attracting guests seeking a luxurious retreat with convenient access to natural beauty and entertainment.

Meeting & Event Spaces With nearly 100,000 square feet of function space, replete with advanced technology and exquisite cuisine options, Red Rock Casino Resort & Spa provides a prestigious venue for international meetings and social events, presenting an opportunity for hosting upscale corporate gatherings and glamorous affairs.

High-End Amenities The resort's opulent accommodations with luxury amenities like spa treatments, fitness centers, and exceptional dining options such as Terra Rossa elevate the guest experience, offering a prime selling point for attracting guests seeking a lavish and comprehensive stay experience.

Entertainment & Nightlife From an 87,000-square-foot casino to scintillating nightlife options, Red Rock Casino Resort & Spa offers a vibrant entertainment scene, making it an appealing destination for guests looking for a dynamic and engaging entertainment experience during their stay.

Competitive Positioning In comparison to similar casinos like Mohegan Sun and Foxwoods Resort Casino, Red Rock Casino Resort & Spa's revenue scale and high employee count indicate its successful market positioning, presenting a competitive edge and potential market leadership opportunities within the hospitality industry.

Red Rock Casino Resort & Spa

HospitalityNevada, United States1001-5000 Employees

Uniquely positioned at the gateway to Red Rock Canyon, one of the most beautiful National parks in the country, just 12 miles from the Las Vegas Strip, Red Rock Casino Resort Spa welcomes you to an oasis of luxury and unsurpassed service. Whether your travel is for attending a conference, leisure or an elegant black-tie affair, take time to enjoy our countless amenities from sensational live entertainment to the finest array of culinary delights. Strategically located less than 25 minutes from McCarran International Airport, our world-class resort invites you to indulge your senses and take in the sumptuous views, as we cater to all of your needs. Embellished with opulent details, our spacious, well-appointed guest rooms and suites feature wired/wireless Internet access, 42 inch plasma TVâs and remarkable views. In between meetings, reward yourself with a luxurious spa treatment, stop by the cutting edge fitness center, or unwind by the pool with delicious refreshments. Terra Rossa is one of our signature restaurants, which treats guests to the finest Italian creations, while the Grand CafÃ© offers a casual setting featuring a variety of American favorites. Your Las Vegas experience would not be complete without a visit to our 87,000-square-foot casino or a taste of our scintillating nightlife. Nearby, explore celebrated attractions from Canyon Pointe Shopping Center to the Las Vegas Strip. Red Rock Casino Resort Spa is a prestigious host for international meetings and glamorous social events. With just under 100,000 square feet of impeccable function space conveniently located to your guest rooms, many rooms feature natural lighting, the most advanced technology and distinctive cuisine, your event will inspire everyone in your group. On behalf of our staff, we look forward to welcoming you to Las Vegas.
